titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Samuel Chamberlain Postcard and Photograph Collection Documenting Yale University
Chamberlain (Samuel) Postcard and Photograph Collection Documenting Yale University Collection
titlestmt.author: compiled by Staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:57

did.unittitle: Samuel Chamberlain postcard and photograph collection documenting Yale University

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The collection consists of postcards and photographs of Yale University. The postcards are part of the American Scenes Postal Card series; the photographs are print copies of the postcard scenes. Included are negatives as well as some non-Yale images.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 46-A (YRG 46-A), Records and materials broadly documenting Yale buildings, facilities, and grounds.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Samuel Chamberlain Postcard and Photograph Collection Documenting Yale University (RU 638). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Moses Pond (1787-1873): lawyer; Connecticut State representative (1837-1855); and selectman of Wolcott, Connecticut.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of postcards and photographs of Yale University. The postcards are part of the American Scenes Postal Card series; the photographs are print copies of the postcard scenes. Included are negatives as well as some non-Yale images.
